SEARCH

Package source.FileIO.Serializer.Text

package source.FileIO.Serializer.Text
  • Class
    Description
    BaseSerializer
    The BaseSerializer class stores the necessary data for sub serializers for the text format.
    CampDeserializer
    The CampDeserializer class deserializes a hashmap of parsed data a list of Camp objects to be used.
    CampSerializer
    The CampSerializer class serializes a list of Camp objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a text file of choice.
    EnquiryDeserializer
    The EnquiryDeserializer class deserializes a hashmap of parsed data a list of enquiry objects to be used.
    EnquirySerializer
    The EnquirySerializer class serializes a list of Enquiry objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a text file of choice.
    StaffDeserializer
    The StudentDeserializer class deserializes a hashmap of parsed data a list of Staff objects to be used.
    StaffSerializer
    The StaffSerializer class serializes a list of Staff objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a text file of choice.
    StudentDeserializer
    The StudentDeserializer class deserializes a hashmap of parsed data a list of Student objects to be used.
    StudentSerializer
    The StudentSerializer class serializes a list of Student objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a text file of choice.
    SuggestionDeserializer
    The SuggestionDeserializer class deserializes a hashmap of parsed data a list of Student objects to be used.
    SuggestionSerializer
    The SuggestionDeserializer class serializes a list of Student objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a text file of choice.
    TextDataDeserializer
    The TextDataDeserializer interface denotes signatures that text-based serializers should implement to deserialize already parsed data.
    TextDataSerializer
    The TextDataSerializer interface denotes functions that subclass serializers should have to serialize a list of objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a file of choice.
